text: Schumannella is a Gram-positive, anaerobic, rod-shaped and non-motile genus of bacteria from the family of Microbacteriaceae with one known species (Schumannella luteola). Schumannella is named after the German microbiologist P. Schumann. Schumannella luteola has been isolated from lichen from Tokyo in Japan. ==References== == Further reading == * Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria genera Category:Monotypic bacteria genera
title: Schumannella
